subject: re:Don't miss this unique chance
body:
Dear customer.
Tired of paying twice the price of a med when buying it from a "reliable" licensed USA Web pharmacy? Our discount Canadian e-shop will show you what real "low prices" should look like.
A pass into your new healthy life can cost less than you think. Try CanadianPharmacy #1 licensed Canadian Web pharmacy. Purchase your medications from CanadianPharmacy and save large with our weekly specials and discount offers. Our prices and quality are the best on the Web.
CanadianPharmacy turn Canadian drug sales taxation system to your advantage.
Sincerely yours,Garrett Longoria
